      • QuestionManager

        public QuestionManager(int type)
        initilizes 20 quiz questions prepared for user's subject
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • askQuestion

        public java.lang.String[] askQuestion()
        Returns:
        the question user is currently on and 4 possible answers in randomized order([question, ans1, ans2, ans3, ans4])

      • isCorrect

        public boolean isCorrect(int selected)
        Parameters:
        selected - index in answer set array chosen by user([question, ans1, ans2, ans3, ans4]), 1 <= selected <= 4
        Returns:
        true if selected answer matches correct answer of corresponding question that user is currently on

      • getCorrectAns

        public int getCorrectAns()
        Returns:
        index of correct answer of question set array ([question, ans1, ans2, ans3, ans4]), between 1 and 4 inclusive

      • nextQuestion

        public void nextQuestion()
        increment question number

      • getQuestionNumber

        public int getQuestionNumber()
        Returns:
        current question number
